snippet.title: Super Mario 64 Sonic Edition (BUILD 4.0)
snippet.description:
In 2001 Nintendo and Sega planned, as one of their first collab, an Add-on for the N64 that 
allowed you to play as Sonic in Mario 64 but due to the hardware being at the end of its lifespan and 
disagreements between the companies it was canceled.
This is all what remained.

Download: https://romhacking.com/hack/mario-64-sonic-edition

Decomp patch for Hackers (read the readme): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1X0Y9XF0zffTagLsSJO4TQQqyIPdrbpP9/view?usp=sharing

PC port and Shadow are coming later

My Twitter:    https://twitter.com/ThoddsGame
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/XS4dtSMk6v

4.0 Patch Notes
-A LOT of bug fixes
-Reworked homing attack
-Emeralds
-New slide-kick
-New Animations
-Better jump control
-Caps replaced with shoes
-Reworked Sonic model
-Ring sound when getting hit with Sonic health
-Health system now selectable in file select
-Faster water jump
